review: I want prospective buyers to pay CLOSE attention to the size (dimensions) of this *little* tray.  It is precisely as it has been pictured; they show it accurately and honestly, and I give them credit for that.  But be aware that it is precisely & accurately depicted; and some people might tend to label it SMALL.It's really small.  For a tablet it will be ideal, and I would think a soft drink cup and a donut would be just fine, but a laptop?!  I doubt it.Anyway - nothing nasty or negative - just be aware of what you're buying.  If you have any doubts, cut out a piece of cardboard and do a little eyeballing in your car.
productTitle: Zone Tech Car Ipad Laptop/Eating Steering Wheel Desk
